mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER( MEM_NO, MEM_EMAIL, MEM_PWD, MEM_NAME, PHONE, MEM_GEN ) VALUES( SEQ_MNO.NEXTVAL, #{memberEmail}, #{memberPwd}, #{memberName}, #{phone}, #{memberGender} )
mapper.select: SELECT MEM_EMAIL, MEM_PWD, MEM_NAME FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_EMAIL = #{memberEmail} AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT MEM_EMAIL, MEM_PWD, MEM_NAME FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_EMAIL = #{memberEmail} AND PHONE = #{phone} AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT MEM_NO, MEM_EMAIL, MEM_PWD, MEM_NAME, MEM_CONCERN, MEM_PRO, PHONE, LOCATION, STATUS, MEM_GEN, POINT, FILE_PATH, ACCOUNT, INTRO FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_EMAIL = #{memberEmail} AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT MEM_NO, MEM_EMAIL, MEM_PWD, MEM_NAME, MEM_CONCERN, MEM_PRO, PHONE, LOCATION, STATUS, MEM_GEN, POINT, FILE_PATH, ACCOUNT, INTRO, ENROLL_DATE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NO = #{memberNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_EMAIL = #{memberEmail}, MEM_NAME = #{memberName}, MEM_CONCERN = #{memberConcern}, PHONE = #{phone}, POINT = #{point} WHERE MEM_NO = #{memberNo}
mapper.select: SELECT PRO_NO, PRO_JOB, CATEGORY_NO, MEM_NO FROM PROFESSIONAL WHERE MEM_NO = #{memberNo}

SELECT S.SCHE_NO, S.SCHE_TITLE, S.SCHE_CONTENT, B.BOARD_NO, M.MEM_NAME, C.CATEGORY_NAME, S.STATUS, S.CREATEDATE, S.LOCATION, M.PHONE FROM SCHEDULE S, MEMBER M, BOARD B, CATEGORY C WHERE S.STATUS = 'Y' AND (B.BOARD_NO = S.BOARD_NO) AND (M.MEM_NO = S.FROM_MNO) AND (C.CATEGORY_NO = S.CATEGORY_NO) AND S.TO_MNO = #{toMemberNo}

SELECT S.SCHE_NO, S.SCHE_TITLE, S.SCHE_CONTENT, B.BOARD_NO, M.MEM_NAME, C.CATEGORY_NAME, S.STATUS, S.CREATEDATE, S.LOCATION FROM SCHEDULE S, MEMBER M, BOARD B, CATEGORY C WHERE S.STATUS = 'Y' AND (B.BOARD_NO = S.BOARD_NO) AND (M.MEM_NO = S.TO_MNO) AND (C.CATEGORY_NO = S.CATEGORY_NO) AND S.FROM_MNO = #{toMemberNo}
SELECT MEM_NO, MEM_EMAIL, MEM_PWD, MEM_NAME, MEM_CONCERN, MEM_PRO, PHONE, LOCATION, STATUS, MEM_GEN, POINT, FILE_PATH, ACCOUNT, INTRO, ENROLL_DATE FROM MEMBER

SELECT MEM_NO, MEM_EMAIL, MEM_NAME, MEM_PRO, PHONE, LOCATION, STATUS, MEM_GEN, POINT, FILE_PATH, ACCOUNT, INTRO, ENROLL_DATE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchText} || '%' OR MEM_EMAIL LIKE '%' || #{searchText} || '%' OR MEM_NO LIKE '%' || #{searchText} || '%' OR MEM_PRO LIKE '%' || #{searchText} || '%' OR ENROLL_DATE LIKE '%' || #{searchText} || '%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AUTHENTICATE ( AUTH_NO, AUTH_EMAIL, AUTH_RANDOM, CREATEDATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_AUNO.NEXTVAL, #{authEmail}, #{authRandom}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT AUTH_NO, AUTH_EMAIL, AUTH_RANDOM, CREATEDATE FROM( SELECT AUTH_NO, AUTH_EMAIL, AUTH_RANDOM, CREATEDATE FROM AUTHENTICATE WHERE AUTH_EMAIL = #{authEmail} AND CREATEDATE BETWEEN SYSDATE - INTERVAL '3' MINUTE AND SYSDATE ORDER BY CREATEDATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT AUTH_NO, AUTH_EMAIL, AUTH_RANDOM, CREATEDATE FROM AUTHENTICATE WHERE CREATEDATE BETWEEN SYSDATE - 3/24/60 AND SYSDATE AND AUTH_EMAIL = #{authEmail} AND AUTH_RANDOM = #{checkNo}
